metadata.title: CVE-2018-19993 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Dolibarr 8.0.2allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via thetransphrase parameter to public/notice.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
